txt.en: 'Elrohir! Don't -- '
'My thoughts keep returning to Mother.'
'Orcs haven't attacked us yet. This can't be their doing, can it?'
'We'll leave this miserable place behind us.'
'Careful! Look, up ahead.'
'Wait!'
'Are you all right? What happened?'
You should continue following Elladan and help him find Elrohir.
DNT
'I hope we don't come across Orcs. Braving this weather is enough of a challenge.'
Your party has paused to take a break from the snow, but it's time to move on.\n\nElladan has something to say to you.
'We can only hope he continued up the pass.'
Frost grims have separated Elrohir from you and Elladan.\n\nYou should defeat the frost grims.
'[placeholder], help me get Elrohir back on his feet.'
Talk to Elladan
Follow the twins
'Hold a moment, [placeholder].'
You should follow Elladan and help him find Elrohir.
'One step at a time. We'll make it out of this storm.'
'Fine! If you want a fight, we'll give you one!'
'I knew you'd find me soon enough.'
'...No, I refuse to let that happen.'
DNT
Defeat the frost grims
'Hey!'
'What matters is that you're okay.'
The body is still warm to the touch
'Curse this snow! Elrohir! Elrohir, come back!'
'Any tracks he leaves behind will be difficult to find.'
'Let's go, Elrohir.'
'But what would be the purpose of all this trickery?'
'Leave us be!'
'To go home without Elrohir...'
'But even just encountering them might tell us something of the Enemy's plans.'
'This mountain will not take another one of my family from me.'
'Elladan, [placeholder], there's someone over there! It almost looks like...'
'I'll be relieved to see the sun shining once again.'
'I'm... I'm not sure what it was. Or who.'
'I'm fine, just tired. I couldn't find that cloaked figure after all.'
'I just want to find my brother!'
Talk to Elladan
'Is that -- '
Follow Elladan
Listen to the twins' conversation
'[placeholder], you saw that figure earlier too, didn't you?'
'Why must every creature on this cursed mountain stand in our way?'
DNT
Mission: The Further Adventures of Elladan & Elrohir, Chapter 3
Talk to Elladan
'Did... did you see that?'
Follow Elladan
'Who are you? Why have you been following us?!'
Examine the snow-beast corpse
Examine the blood

'Neither Elrohir nor I enjoy the idea of taking the pass, but I confess that Orcs are not the sole reason. Many years ago, our mother travelled through here to visit our grandparents in LÃ³rien. She never made it to her destination -- Orcs captured her. When we realized she had disappeared, my brother and I set out to find her. After weeks of searching, we found her alive, but...'

Elladan's voice trails off as he turns away.

'...We'll keep each other safe. We must.'
'I can barely see through all this snow!'
'[placeholder] -- behind us!'
You should follow the twins through the pass.
'I'm sorry. In my haste, I didn't realize I was alone until it was too late.'
'Any Orcs who try to sneak up on us will have a much easier time of it.'
'You!'
DNT
'Elrohir!'
It's possible that Elrohir passed through here, but you still have not found him.\n\nYou should talk to Elladan.
The Redhorn is not kind to any soul, person or beast. Raging blizzards and the biting cold stand in your way, daring you to continue.
'Ready your weapons!'
You have found Elrohir!\n\nYou should let the twins talk.
'[placeholder], help me get rid of these grims!'
Elrohir has disappeared into the blizzard.\n\nYou should talk to Elladan.
'Mine too. I miss her.'
'Elrohir!' Elladan's frantic voice does not carry past the thick curtain of whirling snow.\n\n'He -- he must've thought we'd be following close behind. We must find him. Quickly!'
'No, it must be something else....'
DNT
'We've come this far and seen nothing of his servants.'
There's no telling whose blood spilled here
You have found a snow-beast corpse and some blood. Did Elrohir pass through here?\n\nYou should examine them.
DNT
'No, no. That can't be Elrohir's blood. I don't believe it.\n\n'He must be close. Let's hurry.'
